entry.title: Russia Calls on People to Flee Eastern Ukraine. Most Are Staying Put.
entry.content: Russian-appointed leaders in two breakaway areas announced evacuations Friday, but most people are unmoved after years of fighting.

entry.title: Russia Extends Drills in Belarus as Putin Agrees to More Talks With Ukraine
entry.content: Exercises involving some 30,000 troops near Ukraineâ€™s border will continue beyond a previous end date of Sunday, the government in Minsk said, citing an uptick in violence in eastern Ukraine.

entry.title: Beijing Winter Olympics End With Parade of National Flags, Burst of Fireworks
entry.content: China officially concluded a Beijing Winter Olympics that sought to unify the world but ended up highlighting its divisions.
